scripts.start: node server.js & npm run watch-pg-less & npm run watch-pg-coffee & npm run watch-slicer-coffee
scripts.build: npm run build-pg-less && npm run build-pg-coffee && && npm run build-slicer-coffee
scripts.watch-pg-coffee: watchify -t [ hbsfy -e thtml ] -t coffeeify axolotl/src/app.coffee -o public/assets/axolotl.js
scripts.watch-slicer-coffee: watchify -t [ hbsfy -e thtml ] -t coffeeify axolotl/src/slicer.coffee -o public/assets/slicer.js
scripts.build-pg-coffee: browserify -t [ hbsfy -e thtml ] -t coffeeify axolotl/src/app.coffee -o public/assets/axolotl.js
scripts.build-slicer-coffee: browserify -t [ hbsfy -e thtml ] -t coffeeify axolotl/src/slicer.coffee -o public/assets/slicer.js
